doc.previous: The Ninth Bridgewater Treatise was quoted extensively in Vestiges of the Natural History of Creation 96 The parallel with Babbage s computing machines is made explicit as allowing plausibility to the theory that transmutation of species could be pre programmed 97
doc.after: Jonar Ganeri author of Indian Logic believes Babbage may have been influenced by Indian thought one possible route would be through Henry Thomas Colebrooke 98 Mary Everest Boole argues that Babbage was introduced to Indian thought in the 1820s by her uncle George Everest
